title: Peter McVerry Trust spent money on peacock enclosure and €300k on a driveway
description: The government had to provide the charity with emergency funding of €15 million in 2023.
content:
THE PETER MCVERRY Trust spent funds to build an enclosure for two peacocks at one of its properties in Co Kildare, the Oireachtas Public Accounts Committee (PAC) was told today.
The former chief executive of the charity Francis Doherty said his prede... [4263 chars]
